title: PAYDAY - The Heist v1.21.0 (Crack)
description:
==========
- Be sure, you installed already the apps in folder "redist".
- For changing language (only when you didn't copy right language-content), open file "context.xml" in text editor.
    Edit value of "language=" to: english, french, german, italian or spanish.

... and if you want to play online ...
======================================
- Copy content of folder "Crack" to your game directory.
- Be sure, the read-only flag is set of "steam_appid.txt" and you and your friends use the same AppID (i.e. from a demo or free game) included there.
- Start game in cracked steam (i.e. GreenLuma).

... and if you want to play offline ...
=======================================
- Copy content of folder "Standalone Patch" to your game directory.
- For changing player name, edit file "3dmgame.ini".
- Start game with "payday_win32_release.exe" (either the original or from crack).
